entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Knight & Dragon III
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫179,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

Rare Items! Class Change! And an epic story. The third installment of the full-fledged hack-and-slash RPG "Knight and Dragon," packed with replayability! "Knight and Dragon 3" is the third installment in the hack-and-slash RPG series set in a medieval fantasy world. One morning, after receiving a certificate from an elderly gentleman, proving you as a full-fledged guild member, you are sent to a small village in the Republic of Gringard. This is where the story begins. Various incidents occurring in the Republic, the conflicts with the neighboring Lindahl Empire, and the story of knights and dragons will eventually involve you in a grand destiny revolving around the stars. [Features of Knight and Dragon 3] ‚ñΩ The basic systems of a replayable RPG such as intense real-time battles, rare item drops, and class changes are inherited from the previous game! ‚ñΩ Real-time battles are now more interactive, allowing you to dodge, parry, and counter by reading the enemy‚Äôs attack timings! ‚ñΩ A variety of weapons like axes, spears, and halberds appear among the items! Additionally, you can create characters to your liking, including dual-wielding and two-handed weapons! ‚ñΩ A world map that enhances the epic story is introduced! The story, with even more volume than the previous game, and the end content are still going strong! ‚ñΩ Moreover, in this game, a diverse range of NPCs with unique characteristics, place names, city names, and other proper nouns depict the grand story! ‚ñΩ Other features such as party dispatch and the Persona function, which were well received in the previous game, are of course continued! „Éª„Éª„Éª For those who want to get a feel for the game before purchasing, the previous game "Knight and Dragon" is completely free to enjoy, so please give it a try. Official Homepage http://dgjam.com/knightdragon3

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Chain of Evidence
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫79,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • K√º√ß√ºk Altƒ±n √áantasƒ±Ôºö‚Ç∫9,99
  • B√ºy√ºk Altƒ±n Sandƒ±ƒüƒ±Ôºö‚Ç∫69,99
  • Orta Altƒ±n Sandƒ±ƒüƒ±Ôºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Mega Altƒ±n HazinesiÔºö‚Ç∫199,99

Application Description

Truths don't stay in the dark... In this detective puzzle set among the streets, historical buildings, and dark secrets of Istanbul, each chapter awaits you to solve a new case. Evidence Chain is a gripping detective game that progresses chapter by chapter, where you interrogate suspects and piece together evidence to solve the mystery. At the heart of the game is a card-based interrogation system: Cross-examine witnesses, Gather information by scouring archives, Find traces with specialized tools, Expose suspects' inconsistent statements! Each chapter takes place in a different district of Istanbul: From the narrow streets of Galata to an old secondhand bookstore in Kadƒ±k√∂y, new clues await you in a variety of mysterious locations.

entry.title: FRAMED 2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫179,99 [‚Ç∫179,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99

Application Description

Years ago, a mysterious ship smuggled precious cargo into an exotic land.¬† A standalone entry in the FRAMED series. Change the order, change the outcome. FRAMED 2 is a noir puzzle game where you re-arrange panels of an animated comic book to change the outcome of the story. Taking place before the events of the original game, FRAMED 2 is the follow up to Hideo Kojima's 2014 Game Of The Year, FRAMED. FRAMED 2 is designed for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch iOS 9.0 and above. Optimised for iPhone 5 and above & iPad Air and above. LoveShack Entertainment is an independent game developer based in Australia. www.loveshackentertainment.com Follow us @LoveShackers for news of updates & new games.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Speech to Text : Voice to Text
entry.id: Speech to Text : Voice to Text-tr-1755919834911
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫99,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • MonthÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • YearÔºö‚Ç∫499,99
  • 6 MonthsÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

Application Description

Speech to text : Voice to text is the powerful, real-time dictation solution. Based on the latest artificial intelligence and using a powerful speech recognition engine, This Dictation app accurately transcribes your speech to text in real time. The clean elegant design, along with the non-stop voice recognition and other features means you can relax and focus on your thoughts and content. Using our app , your words will be magically transcribed into text without your ever needing to touch a keyboard. Now you can use the power of your voice to create your words! Easily share your text and files later! (Works with Evernote, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, WhatsApp and other iOS supported sharing apps.) Whether you‚Äôre a professional writer, doctor, lawyer, disabled or somehow prevented from traditional typing, Speech to text : Voice to text app will swiftly solve your transcription problems and help you achieve your writing goals today! This fantastic speech-to-text app will allow you to do more with your iPhone/ iPad : „ÉªLonger Record time: -DICTATE CONTINUOUSLY up-to 1 HOUR. „ÉªUnlimited save & edits „ÉªTranscribed text can be edited directly. „ÉªIdeal for both individual and group transcription „ÉªBackground support for voice recognition. „ÉªOn-device Speech Recognition. ‚Ä¢ Voice recognition support for 59 languages and accents. ‚Ä¢ Share your text on social networks. ‚Ä¢ Copy your text to other apps. ‚Ä¢ Send your text as an email or text message. ‚Ä¢ Create PDF instantly with single click. ‚Ä¢ Convert text your notes, reports, letters into PDF instantly ‚Ä¢ Text Analysis using AI. ‚ñ∫ Currently Supported Speech Recognition Languages: Arabic, Cantonese, Catalan, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malay, Norwegian, Bokm√•l, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Shanghainese, Slovak, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese. Technology: New iOS 14 Speech framework having state of the art accuracy, Faster ,Automatically adapts to the user Super easy: Simply click the microphone and start dictating. No need to login or register You can add new paragraphs, punctuation marks, smileys and other special characters using simple voice commands. Who Should Use Speech to Text : Voice to Text ? 1. Reporters: Interviews, conversations and more are easily recorded and transcribed, preserving the original audio. 2. Writers: Novelists, Authors, can all write in their true voice, capturing their moments of inspiration anytime, anywhere. 3. Professionals: Doctors, lawyers, managers, etc. Easily transcribe your daily tasks, notes, conference calls, letters and more! Your voice makes it happen! 4. Elderly or Disabled: Eliminates slow typing, commonly misspelled words or embarrassing composition mistakes. This app makes it convenient and easy to send and share your words with those you love. 5. Language Students: Text analysis using AI , Easily learn and master new words and languages by practicing dictation with speech to text app ! SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS We offer three auto-renewing subscription options: $1.99 / month $9.49 / 6 months - Save 20% $14.49 / 1 year - Save 40% The price corresponds to the same price segment , which are set in the ‚ÄúApple App Store Matrix‚Äù for other currencies You can cancel a subscription anytime by turning off auto renewal though your iTunes account settings.This must be done 24 hours before the end of subscription period to avoid being charged. The cancellation will take effect the day after the last day of the current subscription. Terms of Service : https://voiceovermaker.com/termsofuse Privacy Policy: https://voiceovermaker.com/privacypolicy Support: Please email for any suggestions/feedback voiceovermakerz@gmail.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: DRAGON QUEST BUILDERS
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫1.299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫999,99 [‚Ç∫449,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.299,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫999,99

In-App Purchases

  • All-in-One PackÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • New Content! Pixel RingÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Boss Monster Model SetÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • New Content! Astronomy SetÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • New Content! Magic CarpetÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

Explore a world made of blocks as you gather, craft, and build to defeat the evil Dragonlord! Build everywhere from anywhere in DRAGON QUEST BUILDERS, available now on mobile. Brought to you by SQUARE ENIX! ‚óÜ TRAVEL AND EXPLORE THE VAST WORLD OF DRAGON QUEST! In this ‚ÄúBlock-Building RPG‚Äù, YOU are the legendary builder that has the power to build! The realm of Alefgard has been plunged into darkness by the terrible and treacherous Dragonlord, the ruler of all monsters. Venture off on the epic adventure to restore Alefgard! ‚óÜ FACE OFF AGAINST VICIOUS FOES! You will encounter Slimes, Golems, Dragons, and more. Familiar DRAGON QUEST monsters of all sizes threaten the survival of humankind! Craft weapons, build defenses, and fight the monsters to protect your base. Use your power to build and play smart when fighting against frightening enemies in action packed combat! ‚óÜ GATHER, CRAFT AND BUILD FROM ANYWHERE! In this world made of blocks, everything you see can be materials used to create! Farm ingredients, craft various items and build your base to unite the people roaming the ruins. From buildings to entire towns, you have the freedom to make your village your very own. The power to build is in the palm of your hands! ‚óÜ BUILD BETTER ON MOBILE WITH SPECIAL FEATURES ADDED! Place blocks by simply tapping the screen and destroy blocks and items more easily with specialized cursors. A convenient Undo Button function has also been added to allow you to restore your work! Convert your buildings in to Build Cards to share with friends and scan their buildings to have them show up in your island! ‚óÜ NEW DLC AS IN-APP PURCHASES New DLC added in ‚ÄúTerra Incognita,‚Äù the land where you can freely build and play! DLC includes: ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúMagic carpet‚Äù, ‚ÄúBoss figure pack‚Äù, ‚ÄúCelestial pack‚Äù, ‚ÄúDot ring‚Äù ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúAll in one pack‚Äù (A set of the above 4) *Please be aware of duplicate purchases. "OS: iOS 13 or later iPhone 8 or later (minimum 3GB of RAM)" *Playing this game on a non-recommended device may result in unexpected errors, such as crashing due to insufficient memory. Please be aware that we may not be able to provide support for non-recommended devices.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Motorsport Manager 4
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • BundleÔºö‚Ç∫449,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

In-App Purchases

  • BundleÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Pre registration bundleÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Premium livery bundleÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Game EditorÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Very Large InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Large InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Huge InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Chairman's PaymentÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success. ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination. REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars. UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry. DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey. YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you. SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.content:

Application Description

Experience survival horror like never before in the 8th major installment in the Resident Evil franchise - Resident Evil Village. With detailed graphics, intense first-person action and masterful storytelling, the terror has never felt more realistic. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†In-App Purchases ‚ñ†Resident Evil Village (Base Game) „ÉªThe Trauma Pack DLC „ÉªSamurai Edge - AW Model-01 „ÉªResident Evil 7 Found Footage Filter „ÉªResident Evil 7 Tape Recorder Save Point „ÉªSaferoom Music "Go Tell Aunt Rhody" „ÉªMr. Everywhere Weapon Charm „ÉªUnlock "Village of Shadows" Difficulty „ÉªThe Tragedy of Ethan Winters Artwork „ÉªThe Baker Incident Report „ÉªSurvival Resources Pack „ÉªMr. Raccoon Weapon Charm ‚ñ†Winters' Expansion „ÉªExperience brand-new additional content for the award-winning modern horror masterpiece Resident Evil Village: Third Person Mode, The Mercenaries Additional Orders, and Shadows of Rose. „ÉªStreet Wolf Outfit „ÉªStreet Wolf Outfit for Rose (applies to Shadow of Rose content only) ‚ñ†Extra Content Shop All Access Vouche ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†By purchasing, you will be granted a license to use the product. ‚ñ†A network connection is required when starting the application. ‚ñ†About the End User License Agreement „ÉªThis End User License Agreement (this ‚ÄúAgreement‚Äù) applies to the user‚Äôs use of this game software program (the ‚ÄúProgram‚Äù). „ÉªTHIS AGREEMENT SHALL COME INTO EFFECT BETWEEN CAPCOM CO., LTD. AND USER(S) UPON INSTALLATION OF THE PROGRAM BY THE USER. „ÉªThose users between the ages of 13 and 18 (or between 13 and the age of legal majority in your country of residence) or a person with limited capacity shall install the Program only after obtaining approval from its parent or legal guardian who agrees to be bound by these provisions of this Agreement. Please confirm the terms above and agree to this Agreement before purchasing the Program. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†A limited part of the base game can be played for free. In order to play the full game, an in-app purchase is required. ‚ñ†This game can be played without a controller, however we recommend using a controller as the game has been optimized for controller use. ‚ñ†This application is approximately 35GB. Important Note: The installation process requires that you have at least twice the size of the application in free storage space available. We recommend downloading the data in an environment with good connectivity. ‚ñ†Save data upload and download functionality via iCloud Drive has been added. ‚ñ†Save data cannot be uploaded and downloaded between MacOS and iOS devices. ‚ñ†Resident Evil Village does not support Universal Purchase. ‚ñ†Purchase Precautions „ÉªAfter purchase, returns (including exchange for other products/services) will not be provided for any reason. „ÉªIn-app purchases can only be used by the Apple Account that made the purchase and cannot be shared with Family Sharing members. ‚ñ†Compatible OSs and Devices https://www.capcom-games.com/apple/en-us/ ------------------------------------------------------------ RESIDENT EVIL is a trademark and/or registered trademark of CAPCOM CO., LTD. and/or its subsidiaries in the U.S. and/or other countries.

Please ensure that your device is compatible via the app's Contact page (link below). https://bnfaq.channel.or.jp/title/3152 You are purchasing a license for digital goods. For full terms and conditions, please see the License Agreement below. [Game Summary] A Naruto game full of 3D competitive action! NARUTO: Ultimate Ninja STORM finally makes its way to smartphones! Experience the stories and battles of Naruto's childhood through beautiful graphics! Game Content Ultimate Mission Mode Relive the stories and famous battles from Naruto's childhood! You can freely move around the Hidden Leaf Village and take on missions and mini games! Free Battle Mode In Free Battle Mode, you can choose from 25 unique characters from Naruto's childhood and 10 support characters to enjoy a variety of powerful ninjutsu actions and battles! Changes for the App Easily activate ninjutsu, ultimate jutsu, and other actions with a tap! Even those playing the series for the first time can confidently enjoy the game! Plus, the following additional features and improvements have made the game easier to play: - New auto-save feature - New control mode selection for battle (casual/manual) - New battle assist feature (casual only) - Improved controls for battle and free movement - New retry feature for missions - Improved mini-game UI - Improved tutorial Play Notes - This game contains violent content. - Please pay attention to how long you play and avoid excessive gameplay. - Êú¨ÈÅäÊà≤ÈÉ®‰ªΩÂÖßÂÆπÊ∂âÂèäÊö¥ÂäõÊÉÖÁØÄ - Ë´ãÊ≥®ÊÑèÈÅäÊà≤ÊôÇÈñì,ÈÅøÂÖçÊ≤âËø∑ [Number of Players] This is a single-player game only. entry.title: Religion inc. God Simulator
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫199,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫9,99 [‚Ç∫9,99 ~ ‚Ç∫199,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99

Application Description

You are reading this text. But why? Are you looking for a game, or has the game found you? Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game. It is a simulation of creating a new reality. Will you shape faith, or will faith shape you? Humanity has always sought light in the darkness. It has always longed to believe in something greater, something that gives meaning to existence. That‚Äôs how religions were born ‚Äì as beacons in the storms of history, as compasses in the ocean of life. What if you become the creator of a religion? What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality? You are the Creator. You are the source. You are the inspiration. And if you are reading this text ‚Äì you‚Äôre already in the game! All that‚Äôs left is to install ‚Äì and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions! Become the source of faith ‚Äì in the strategy simulator Religion Inc. Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness. There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity. Game Features *A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions! *Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more! *Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours! *Hundreds of real-world religious aspects ‚Äì and even more to come! Learn more about world religions! *Unique active abilities for each archetype ‚Äì perform miracles and change the world! *Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy! Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator ‚Äì Religion Inc. Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!

entry.title: Eco inc.
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫349,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫9,99 [‚Ç∫9,99 ~ ‚Ç∫349,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99

In-App Purchases

  • +100 boosters ECO-Initiative!Ôºö‚Ç∫10,00
  • +444! Triple-Four Booster PackÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • +2026 boosters ECO-Initiative!Ôºö‚Ç∫229,99

Application Description

A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth! About game ECO inc. Save The Earth: * Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives. * Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy. * Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking. * An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues. *Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth. *Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful decisions that will determine the future of the Earth. *Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world. *Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet. * Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them. How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide: The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage. Then, step by step, restore and improve the eco-situation of the Earth. Yeah, it's an epic quest ;) At the end of the game, you will receive statistics on how successful your mission was. Each step leads to different consequences, you will need to take thoughtful and quick actions. Useful information: Green Days: Eco Calendar ‚Äî your personal guide to the planet‚Äôs most important environmental events! Follow Earth Days, Forest Days, Ocean Days, and Biodiversity Days. Plan your eco-actions and help make the world greener! List of Global Green Holidays: February 2 ‚Äî World Wetlands Day March 3 ‚Äî World Wildlife Day March 21 ‚Äî International Day of Forests March 22 ‚Äî World Water Day March 23 ‚Äî World Meteorological Day April 7 ‚Äî World Health Day (eco-focus) April 22 ‚Äî Earth Day May 22 ‚Äî International Day for Biological Diversity June 5 ‚Äî World Environment Day June 8 ‚Äî World Oceans Day June 17 ‚Äî World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought July 28 ‚Äî World Nature Conservation Day September 16 ‚Äî International Day for the Preservation of the Ozone Layer October 4 ‚Äî World Animal Day October 13 ‚Äî International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction November 6 ‚Äî International Day for Preventing the Exploitation of the Environment in War and Armed Conflict December 11 ‚Äî International Mountain Day Join millions of eco heroes around the world and become part of the global movement to save the planet! :)

Application Description

Take the beloved Out of the Park Baseball series with you wherever you go. The award-winning baseball simulation game is now in your hands wherever you are in the world! Manage teams, control any franchise in 2025 or throughout MLB History, build and draft your Perfect Team, build a completely fictional baseball universe and so much more. You can oversee your league at a high level or play out each game in the gorgeous 3D game mode, managing play by play or even pitch by pitch. OOTP has it all covered. Play Your Way ¬∑ Franchise Mode: A single-player oriented mode where you can run your favorite MLB, KBO, international or fictional baseball organization. 2025 MLB and 2025 KBO seasons - with accurate teams, schedules, and rosters - are included! Plus! 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons also included. ¬∑ Perfect Team Mode: Build a dynasty in this online mode competing against players around the world. Manage MLB History ¬∑ Gain access to historical MLB leagues and rosters from 1901 - 2024 ¬∑ Simulate any and all MLB scenarios and games that you have dreamt of ¬∑ Manage all on-field decisions and strategies ¬∑ Draft, scout, trade, and sign players to build a powerhouse Official MLB & KBO Licenses ¬∑ Full 2025 rosters from both MLB & KBO franchises free with game purchase ¬∑ Includes full MLB and MiLB rosters Create Your Perfect Team ¬∑ Create your own custom team to pit against players around the world ¬∑ Cross-platform compatibility with Out of the Park Baseball 26 users ¬∑ Pull and collect player cards from the vast player pool available ¬∑ Compete in tournaments against other players to see who has the best team New This Year ¬∑ Full Scouting System: Improve scouting accuracy on players, develop reports, choose priorities, assign scouting budgets, and more ¬∑ 3D Upgrades: New dynamic scoreboard, custom randomized fictional park generation ¬∑ Roster, AI, and Engine: Greatly improved AI, added more variety and detail in players ratings by expanding the internal scale ¬∑ KBO Improvements: Added military service time and free agent cash compensation ¬∑ Perfect Team Notifications: New settings all you to choose what to receive push notifications about ¬∑ Perfect Team Clubhouse Stars: Purchase exclusive cards and pack bundles with these Stars; earned through tournaments, Perfect Draft, and league play. ¬∑ Perfect Team Variants: New and revamped boosted-card mechanic, with a more user friendly way to boost; "feed as you go" ¬∑ And more! OOTP Go 26 comes with an additional three historical MLB seasons for FREE! Run any franchise from the 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons. All other historical MLB seasons (1901-2024) available for purchase. Major League and MiLB trademarks and copyrights are used with permission of Major League Baseball. Officially Licensed Product ‚Äì MLB Players, Inc. PLAYERS CHOICE¬Æ Out of the Park Developments ¬© Copyright 2025. All Rights Reserved * Access permission notice for gameplay ¬∑ STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos. ¬∑ MEMORY: Recommended system minimum of 2 GB RAM ¬∑ PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls. ¬∑ CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account. ‚Äª You'll be able to enjoy the service except features related to above authorities even if you don't give permission to the above. "Consumer Information: ‚Ä¢ Language support: English, ÌïúÍµ≠Ïñ¥ ‚Ä¢ Items are available for purchase in this game. Some paid items may not be refundable depending on the type of item. ‚Ä¢ For Com2uS Mobile Game Terms of Service, visit http://www.withhive.com/. - Terms of Service : http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T1 - Privacy Policy : http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T3 ‚Ä¢ For questions or customer support, please contact our Customer Support by visiting https://support.ootpdevelopments.com/portal/en/home
